website_summaries.verdict: Made from reliable materials, this simple wall mount will keep your console safe and securely mounted on any surface.
pros: Made from high quality steel, this mount is both sturdy and lightweight
The console fits perfectly into place so you never have to worry about it slipping and falling
For even more added protection, this mount is lined with anti-scratch padding
There is plenty of open space to allow for proper heat ventilation
This mount can be installed on the wall or on the back of your TV
cons: Unlike many other models, the VIVO mount doesn't include extra storage for games or controllers

customer_reviews.title: Kinda cheap, didn’t hold switch as securely as others
customer_reviews.text: The metal on this is plenty thick (stamped sheet metal) but the overall design left me a little hesitant when mounting my switch. I have no concerns about the mount failing but didn’t care for how the switch sort of balanced on the tiny platform with only a small rubber band to secure it, I’ll keep it around for a modem or something like that but I went with a competitors product for my switch
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Buck

customer_reviews.title: Qucik & Easy
customer_reviews.text: If you want something that's no frills and a quick way to mount your Nintendo Switch then this is what you want. Find your place on the wall and mark the holes and add either screws or nails. Put the dock in it and hang. Boom, done in 5 minutes. Never fallen off even with taking my switch out and putting it back in constantly.

customer_reviews.title: I currently own three, and I think I am likely to buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.text: I have the mounts attached to the back of my entertainment center rather than the wall, but it effectively acts the same. I have no complaints about the item. If you have a similar need, I highly recommend this product.

product_meta.title: VIVO Black Adjustable Streaming Media Player, Wall Mounting Bracket Designed for Nintendo Switch, Apple TV, Roku, Fire TV, Hardware Included (MOUNT-ALL02)
product_meta.description:
Find the ideal setup for your home theater system with this sturdy Nintendo Switch mount (MOUNT-ALL02) from VIVO! Win back valuable shelf space by mounting your gaming system to the back of a TV or sturdy flat surface. Featuring solid steel construction for excellent support, an open frame design for optimal airflow, adjustable width for a customized setup, and standard mounting holes that fit the majority of TV’s on the market, this mount was built to perform! The sleek, black appearance keeps a low profile while maintaining a classy look. All hardware is provided for easy assembly to get your Nintendo Switch mounted in no time! 

Compatibility This mount is compatible with the Nintendo Switch (not included). 

Features 
Color: Black 
Construction: Solid Steel 
Weight Capacity: 2.2 lbs 
Dimensions: 5” x 1.9” - 3” x 5”
feature_bullets: STURDY STEEL CONSTRUCTION ensures excellent support for your Nintendo Switch, and a light-weight design makes the mounting process fast and easy. The Switch Dock easily slides into the mount for a secure fit.
ADJUSTABLE WIDTH of 1.9” to 3” provides a customizable option that allows you to find the ideal mounting setup for your entertainment center or home theater system.
OPEN FRAME DESIGN of this sleek, low-profile mount complements the appearance of the Nintendo Switch, and provides optimal cooling and airflow that can extend the product life of your gaming system.
SAVE SPACE on your shelf and maintain a clean and organized appearance by getting your Nintendo Switch secured and out of harm's way.
EASY ASSEMBLY is ensured with all the necessary hardware and instructions provided to get your Nintendo Switch up and mounted in no time!
